title: O&O RescueBox 5 Personal Edition
description: The new O&O RescueBox 5 is THE data recovery bundle for resolving almost any crisis involving your computer. It is immediately bootable from a CD and has its own independent operating system. Data recovery has never been easier thanks to the integration of O&O DiskRecovery 4.1, O&O FormatRecovery 4 and O&O UnErase 4. O&O RescueBox 5 can recover files from nearly every type of storage media and also includes the new O&O DiskImage 3 and PartitionManager 2 products. Just think of what it means to have everything you need for imaging data, managing disks, and recovering lost data in just one package.
